entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 30 km/h late in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023
